name: .BIQ
summary: Learn about .BIQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a BIQ file with Civilization III (Windows, Mac) with the Conquests expansion installed. Note that the Complete edition of Civilization III includes the Conquest expansion.
To load a BIQ file in Civ 3 Conquests or Complete edition, place the file in the game's Conquests/â€‹Conquests directory. Then, open the game and select the conquest your BIQ file contains.
